asset.author: breville

transcripts: Everyone enjoys silky smooth warm milk but making the perfect cup of steaming milk without burning it isn't always the easiest thing to do. And some people like their milk piping hot while others prefer it just slightly warmed . With its variable temperature control, the breville milk cafe automates the process to create a smooth velvety consistency foremilk every time. Use the cappuccino disc to froth milk to a thick and creamy consistency . But today I'm going to use the late a disc. So after the cappuccino this right here on the base. Drop the disk in and make sure it's secure . Use cold fresh milk and the type of milk whether it's whole milk 1%, 2% soy or almond milk will affect the amount of frost. So I will use whole milk so just pour it in. And make sure you stay within the max and min line . The jug will actually send see if there is too much milk so make sure you stick with in the zone. So just put the lid on and select the desired temperature . And for a lot a you want to stay within this minimum temp and now just press the dial . After a few seconds, you'll see the milk slowly start swirl. This is using induction heating . The heating element is gently wrapped around the jug to heat the milk. And this creates a faster result. When your milk has reached the desired temperature, you will a ready chime. Discounted anywhere from 2 to 7 minutes depending on the type of milk used. Look how wonderfully smooth and silky this milk has bubbled using the lot a disc . Once it's ready you want to use the milk right away . Cyril the froth milk in a circular motion before you pour it into your cup . And if your frosting for a large crowd rinse the jug in cold water between each batch to cool down the stainless steel. You can also use the colts the setting for iced beverages where to store already warm milk without additional heat. The setting will mix for about 60 seconds so you can blend in syrup and powders . But whenever adding ingredients give it a chance to start up for a few seconds without starting anything . And if you use the measuring shot lid, you’ll create less mess. For a quick clean up, the jug lid measuring cafe and frothing discs are all dishwasher safe and be sure to wash it out before each use milk can build up and calcify if not cleaned properly . The food cafe brought to you by the food thinkers at breville .
